sentence.Network_en: You'll only get the desk through the door if you turn it edgeways.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要把书桌侧着才能搬过这道门。

sentence.Network_en: He spent all the time talking and they could not get a word in edgeways.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一直说个不停，他们都插不上嘴。

sentence.Network_en: He talks so much that no one else can get a word in edgeways.
sentence.Network_cn: 他讲得太多了,别人一句话也插不上嘴.

jx.jx_en_mean: [usu. with negative]contribute to a conversation with difficulty because the other speaker talks almost without pause

entry.def: If you say that you cannot get a word in edgeways, you are complaining that you do not have the opportunity to speak because someone else is talking so much.

example.ex: He spent all the time talking and they could not get a word in edgeways.
example.tran: 他一直说个不停，他们都插不上嘴。

means.word_mean: 1. as if by an edge; barely;

sentences.sentence: "I could not get a word in edgewise"

means.word_mean: 2. with the edge forward or on, by, or toward the edge;
